caption.p: Temporal evolution of the beetles infestation of the stored in the mini-silos during the trial (240 day). CW, control wheat; W + EO, wheat treated with the essential oil of Ocimum basilicum; W + DEs, wheat treated with diatomaceous earths; W + Des + OE, wheat treated with O. basilicum essential oil and diatomaceous earths. Data represent the mean number of adults kg âˆ’1 of grain. Bars represent the standard error.
